Experience1.ExperienceContent1: With class-leading digital projection and 7.1 premium surround sound, we can ensvure a satisfying experience throughout your movie in this hall. Furnished with congenial seats that provide ample legroom space, relaxation and comfort will have a new improved meaning for you.

Experience2.ExperienceContent2: Every IMAX® theatre is  custom-designed to deliver the ultimate audio and visual experience. Most standard screens are small so the most obvious difference is the  large IMAX® screens which span wall-to-wall and floor-to ceiling. The screen is not only wider and higher  but also curved as well bringing you closer to the screen.  This places you in the center of the action and creates an  immersive experience no matter where you\'re sitting.

Experience3.ExperienceContent3: The Deluxe hall which debuted in Central i-City meets its forerunner on another level altogether. This hall  has everything you love about the Deluxe hall but with more comfort. Making sure you get only the best,  Deluxe+ really defines the phrase, “get seated and get  comfortable”.

Policy.PolicyTitle: The privacy and personal data policy  and practices of GWS. GWS Movies Sdn Bhd,and its affiliated related companies (GWS) set out in this Privacy Policy and Personal Data Notice apply to all personal data provided to GWS, whether in electronic form or otherwise. By visiting and using www.gsc.com.my and www.gwsmovies.com.my (GWS’s Website), any mobile applications run and maintained by GWS (GWS Mobile Application),and other services provided by GWS as well as by providing personal data to GWS, you agree to be bound by the terms and  conditions of this Privacy Policy and Personal Data Notice.If you do not agree to such terms and conditions, please do not use or access GWS’s Website or GWS Mobile Application, use the services provided by GWS  or provide any  personal data to GWS.

NowShowing10.MovieSynopsis10: 1980s` TV series "Fantasy Island" gets a horror twist in this big screen adaptation. A mysterious man named Mr. Roarke makes the secret wishes of his guests at a luxurious but remote tropical resort come true. However, the guests must solve the island`s mystery so they can escape with their lives when the fantasies suddenly turn into nightmares.

NowShowing11.MovieSynopsis11: The story focuses on a pack of mercenaries who are all centuries-old immortals able to heal from any wound. Just as they find another immortal has "awakened", they realize someone is onto their secret and have to fight for their freedom.

NowShowing12.MovieSynopsis12: Ian and Barley Lightfoot are two elf brothers living in a suburban fantasy world, where no humans exist and it is instead populated by creatures like elves, trolls, mermaids and more. One day, the two teens embark on a journey to discover if there is still magic left in the world. They are hoping to use magic to spend one day with the father they lost when they were still too young to remember him. When one of them later tries to bring their father back using a spell, only the bottom half of their father appears. As the spell only lasts for 24 hours, they must find a way to bring back the rest of him, not just his legs, before they run out of time.

NowShowing13.MovieSynopsis13: With the unpredictable Cash serving as their guide, adventurous couple Eric and Jennifer and their friends Yolanda and Viktor set off to explore an uncharted cave system in a remote part of Northern Australia. Thinking that they will be safe underground as a tropical storm approaches, their thoughts are proven wrong when the caves begin to flood and they find themselves trapped in there. As they fight for their survival, they come to realise that there is something else to worry about other than the rising water and falling oxygen levels, as the storm has also brought in a pack of dangerous and hungry crocodiles.

NowShowing14.MovieSynopsis14: Casey Reynolds, a staff at a museum located in the heart of the woods, believes that the vintage Jack-In-The-Box that is donated to the place is cursed. He thinks that the creepy clown doll inside it has a life of its own. He then realises he will have to find a way to end its curse when his colleagues begin dying one by one, or he will end up dead too.

NowShowing15.MovieSynopsis15: The movie tells of how Scooby and Shaggy first met and become lifelong friends, as well as how they come to form the famous Mystery Inc. with young detectives Fred, Velma and Daphne. It also follows the gang on their most challenging and biggest mystery yet, which involves them stopping ghost dog Cerberus from being unleashed upon the world. They soon learn of Scooby`s secret legacy and epic destiny as they try to stop the global "dogpocalypse".

NowShowing16.MovieSynopsis16: Growing up together in an orphanage, Wang Yi Zhi falls in love with Xin Xin and whenever he miser her, she will sneeze. His feelings for her grow stronger as they grow older. Hoping to win her love, he trains to become a boxer. However, before he could confess his feelings to her, she falls in love with a computer engineer, who looks geeky but is actually a famous superhero. One day, when Xin Xin gets kidnapped, Yi Zhi must use his fighting skills to save her.

NowShowing17.MovieSynopsis17: The original show, "The Special Live Reading, Memoirs Under the Moonlight", premiered on the eve of the broadcast of the 26th and final episode of the anime adaptation of "Kimetsu no Yaiba". In this 2-hour show, six main members of the cast will be featured in costume and performing their lines onstage. The live reading includes a brand-new animated short made exclusively for the event called "School Life! A Kimetsu Academy Story", which is a comical three-episode arc showing what "Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba" would be if it were a school story.

NowShowing3.MovieSynopsis3: Set in 2010, Taichi is now a college student while the others are also following their own paths in life. Over 10 years have passed since they met and had their adventure in Digital World. Now the sight of Digimon in the real world is more common and DigiDestined`s existence is also gradually acknowledged. But during this time, a powerful Digimon called Eosmon starts robbing other DigiDestined of their consciousness, prompting scholars Menoa and Imura to turn to Taichi and his friends for help. While battling Eosmon, Taichi notices something is wrong with Agumon`s and the others` evolutions. He and his friends then learn a shocking truth from Menoa, a Digimon will cease to exist when its DigiDestined becomes an adult. Taichi must decide if he wants to continue fighting, if it means losing his partner much sooner.

He has quit the job in order to pursue his dream of writing web comics. He soon finds himself in a lot of trouble after posting the story because it contains classified information.

NowShowing6.MovieName6: Baba Yaga: Terror of the Dark Forest
NowShowing6.MovieSynopsis6: Egor`s parents hire a new nanny to take care of his newborn sister after the family moves to an apartment on the city`s outskirts. He notices the nanny exhibiting strange behaviours but his parents ignore him when he tries telling them, choosing to believe instead in the nothing-out-of-the-ordinary happenings that they can see via the surveillance cameras. When the nanny mysteriously disappears along with his sister and his parents even more mysteriously forget the baby`s existence, he works with his friends to look for her. He is horrified to learn that the nanny`s true identity is Baba Yaga, an ancient Slavic demon.

NowShowing8.MovieSynopsis8: Located in Fukuoka Prefecture, Inunaki Village becomes known as Howling Village due to the many horror stories surrounding it. Kanae`s brother Yuma and his girlfriend Akina visit the supposedly cursed place to test their courage but this causes Akina to lose her sanity and she ends up committing suicide. When Yuma returns to the village with his friends, he goes missing while all his friends end up dead. Being a psychiatrist with a sixth sense, Kanae decides she must solve the mysterious case. She then discovers that her ancestors might be related to the strange incidents.

NowShowing9.MovieSynopsis9: Marine Ray Garrison finds himself resurrected as a superhuman by a secret team of scientists after he and his wife are murdered. Enhanced with nanotechnology, he is now a biotech killing machine called Bloodshot. He is unable to remember anything from his past at first but when his memories return, he breaks out of the facility to go after the man who killed him and his wife. However, he discovers something more to the conspiracy.

Nowshowing1.MovieSynopsis1: Deku, Bakugo and the other students of U.A. Academy Class 1-A get temporarily assigned for hero work on an island south of Japan. All Might, retired No. 1 Hero, told them it is part of a project to raise the next generation of heroes. On the island, Deku and the others assist the citizens with their daily tasks. Things are calm at first until a group of villains, led by Nine, suddenly appear to destroy the island`s facilities. As they try to figure out why Nine is attacking the island, Deku and his friends must protect the citizens from Nine and his gang of villains.

Nowshowing2.MovieSynopsis2: Bethany, Martha and Fridge re-enter the game "Jumanji" after discovering that Spencer has been sucked back into it. When Spencer`s friend, Milo, and grandfather, Eddie, hear the commotion, they check up on it and end up being unwittingly dragged into the game too. In the game world, the gang realises that the game has changed, even their avatars are jumbled up now. Nothing is what they expect. They will have to brave unexplored arid deserts to snowy mountains to make their way out of the world`s most dangerous game.

ComingSoon10.MovieSynopsis10: This movie serves as a sequel to the 1992 horror movie "Candyman". It is set in the same Chicago neighbourhood where the legend began, but the section where the Cabrini-Green housing projects once stood is now gentrified. After visual artist Anthony McCoy moves into a luxury condo there with his girlfriend, gallery director Brianna Cartwright, he soon learns about the vengeful spirit that haunts the place. Called Candyman, he becomes fascinated by it and begins using the macabre details behind the supernatural killer`s true story as inpiration for his new paintings. Unfortunately for him, this leads to not only a horrifying wave of violence but also forces him to face his past which unravels his sanity.

When Lieutenant Artemis and her United Nations military team end up in an alternate dimension after falling into a portal, they encounter terrifying monsters in the hostile land. As they desperately look for a way home, they decide to join forces with a mysterious hunter, who has unique skills that have allowed him to survive there, to stop the monsters from entering the portal and attacking Earth.

One of the most sensational cases from their files, it starts with a fight for the soul of a young boy, then takes them beyond anything they'd ever seen before, to mark the first time in U.S. history that a murder suspect would claim demonic possession as a defense.

ComingSoon9.MovieSynopsis9: A little boy stumbles across a conference of witches while staying with his grandmother at a hotel, and gets transformed into a mouse by the Grand High Witch.
